entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Brampton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:28 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 02:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to ice pellets or periods of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
